item.title: CRITICAL REFLEX TIME showcase set for September 15
item.content:encoded:
New trailers, game releases, and more from 15 upcoming titles.

CRITICAL REFLEX will host the CRITICAL REFLEX TIME showcase on September 15 at 10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET, the publisher announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The showcase will feature new trailers, game releases, and more from 15 upcoming titles across the CRITICAL REFLEX lineup, including:

  • Altered Alma – A cyberpunk Metroidvania with RPG and dating simulation elements.
  • Burden Street Station – An off-kilter, non-linear narrative adventure game.
  • Drowned Lake – A Brazilian folklore-inspired survival horror game.
  • GIMMIKO – A psychedelic, cat-based, twin-stick, dice-building action roguelite game.
  • Militsioner – A new look at the giant policeman we all secretly wanna date in the surrealist immersive simulation game.

Additionally, CRITICAL REFLEX TIME will kick off a week of launches for CRITICAL REFLEX, including:

  • No, I’m not a Human – September 15
  • TOLEU – September 15
  • Eclipsium – September 19

Watch a teaser trailer below.

Teaser Trailer
